item.title: Embracing Death
item.description:
I wrote this presentation for a weekend futurist getaway where everyone gives talks about their topic of interest. With so much focus on overcoming death, I thought I’d take the naturalist perpective for a moment and look at the evolutionary advantages of death, integrating machine learning models to support their claims. Here is the presentation: Embracing Death Presentation.

The major rebuttal to my arguments, that death is a positive evolutionary force were that:
